index.name: bitcoin
index.subtitle: Bitcoin
index.about: Bitcoin is an innovative payment network and a new kind of money. Bitcoin uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority or banks; managing transactions and the issuing of bitcoins is carried out collectively by the network.
index.description: See all main Bitcoin communities around the world

devgroups.title: BitcoinTalk
devgroups.description: The main Bitcoin discussion forum, includes subforums for technical support, mining, development and economics.

devgroups.title: Bitcoin Discussion
